James G

Plenty of cards left.  Open to offers.

Thanks


James G

Open to offers and might be willing to trade for VG Old Mill cards.

Seems everyone can sell T206s but me.  Don't be shy, the stuff isn't expensive and if you don't like the price LMK.  Group deals encouraged :-D

Figured I would try another bump on these.

James G
